div.head: 金刃傷瘡
div.div: wounds inflicted by metal [objects such as a] blade

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: wounds inflicted by metal [objects such as a] blade

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jin chuang 金瘡 , wounds inflicted by metal objects. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry sang 桑 qotes ZYJYGLF : 金刃傷瘡：新桑白皮燒灰，和馬糞塗瘡上，數 易之 , “For wounds inflicted by metal [objects such as a] blade : Burn fresh sang bai pi to ashes, mix with horse dung for external application on the wound. Replace several times”.
